original_text: The Israelites were subdued on that occasion, and the people of Judah were victorious because they relied on the Lord, the God of their ancestors.
korean_text: 그 때에 이스라엘 자손이 항복하고 유다 자손이 이겼으니 이는 그들이 그들의 조상들의 하나님 여호와를 의지하였음이라

sentences.original_text: The Israelites were subdued on that occasion
and the people of Judah were victorious
because they relied on the Lord
